Reviews.Title: Canon EOS 7D
Reviews.Author: Fernando Malkun
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera, very easy to work with, excellent video resolution and sensitivity to low light. Great product. Better than my Panasonic HVX 200, but without electric zoom capabilities.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 3-inch LCD - Body (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Type LP-E6 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - AC/DC Rapid Battery Charger
Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors - BONUS!! Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras
Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 7D 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-200mm f/3.5-5.6 IS Standard Zoom Lens + 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
